meta_analysis.name: Alter 2024 - Ocean Acidification Effects on Marine Organisms

pico.intervention: Elevated CO2 / ocean acidification / ocean warming

extraction.notes: GT data uses SE. Papers may report SD or SE - extract as reported.

ground_truth.data_completeness: 100% (all rows have means, SE, and N)

validation.stratification: By organism type (fish/inverts) and response category
challenges: Factorial CO2 x Temperature designs - need to specify which comparison to extract
Marine biology domain requires adapted prompts
Some studies may have multiple species per paper

pdf_source.notes: 217 papers need to be downloaded. Most should be available via DOI. Consider using Unpaywall API or institutional access.
